name: formulaically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that contains or consists of words or ideas that are not original or new, or that follow a fixed or traditional pattern or style: They seemed to get the wedding photos done as quickly and formulaically as possible. It's hard to work out what attracted the director to this formulaically romantic tale.
More examplesFewer examplesThis bright, formulaically arranged stage design matches the play's tidy structure.The speech is similar to all those he has delivered before: formulaically aggressive.Written early in his career, the film jumps formulaically from conflict to conflict.
